mapper.sql: id, name, eventValue, pinyin, enable, beid
mapper.insert: insert into bas_anaes_event (id, name, eventValue, pinyin, enable, beid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bas_anaes_event
id,

mapper.update:
update bas_anaes_event
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eventValue = #{eventValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_anaes_event set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventValue = #{eventValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bas_anaes_event where 1 = 1 and beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid} ${filter}
select max(eventValue) from bas_anaes_event where beid = #{beid}
